TopicTitle: Are there any "Procedural Solar Panels" Mods?

Articles.Content:
Hey, I Love Making Giant Space Stations and Giant spacecraft But The Stock Solar Panels are way to small and Underpowered so I can't get enough electricity to run the thousands of SAS Modules and Ion Engines on my spacecraft. I Have Tried Many Mods to Overcome this problem but None of them work. Is there a Mod that add Procedural Solar Panels or something Similar to that?

Edited January 28, 2015 by HuntsmanThe8
TweakScale would be a start, you can change the maximum size of things with simple MM patches. Just note that models tend to get ugly if you enlarge them too much.
I kind of want some circular solar panels, like the orion

There are circular solar panels in Near Future Solar. It is made based on the orion solar panel, so exactly what you need there. Also, if you are running with a ton of ion engines or other extremely energy consuming crafts, try mods with nuclear generators and other kind of generator using fuels (karbonite, for example).
